channel.title: Culture on Maxwell Jensen's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Maxwell Jensen's Website

item.title: My Life in Norway
item.description: I was born and raised in Norway. My father was a naval officer from Gdynia, Poland, who sought asylum in the country in 1986, and my mother immigrated from Zambr√≥w in 1996. I want to talk a bit about some important decisions I undertook recently in my life. The goal is to share some insights which are relevant to Norwegians, or anyone else who finds multicultural exchanges interesting. As most of us know, we live in a world of global exchange of not just goods, but also ideas and culture.
